channel.title: Client Ip Change Is having errors
channel.description: Im using the newly released Rune Legacy source and when i go into the client files and go to client.java, and change the 127.0.0.1 ip to my ip, it gives me errors when i try to run . it says something like : java.net.unknownhostexception: and then it shows my server ip
